Travel is Precious.

Helping hotels inspire their guests and guide them to better experiences.

Request Info
“The essence of hospitality is to enable richer travel experiences for guests.”

  • 72%

    of the average guests' budget during their stay is spent off property.

  • 84%

    of the average guests' waking hours are spent off property.

  • 42%

    of travelers are frustrated by fragmented information during travel planning.

Give your guests the keys to the city.

Easily create interactive city guides for your guests to help lead them to experiences and places that you reccomend.

Step 1: Create your Guide

Each guide is hand crafted for your hotel from your branding, logo, and colors to the actual content and experiences published to the site.

  • Access Our Content

  • Select Your Activities

  • Apply Your Branding

  • Publish Your Guide

  • Tell Your Story

Step 2: Reach your guests

  • Before & During

  • All Devices

  • No App Dowloads

  • Social Sharing

  • Personalized Content

Before & During

Reach guests before they arrive on property through confirmation and pre-arrival emails to help them plan and get excited for their upcoming stay. CityKey micro-sites also integrate with your wi-fi login enabling you to reach guests who didn’t book direct as well as with your existing website to help you tell your hotel’s story to prospective guests.

All Devices

45% of site traffic for CityKey guides comes from mobile devices which is why the platform was built with various screen sizes in mind. CityKey is built with the latest web technologies which means responsive design allows guests to use your hotel’s guide across any device.

No App Dowloads

Hotel app downloads suffer from less than 5% download rates. CityKey was built with mobile web technologies meaning no app downloads are required from your guests and they can access your guide at any time before, during, or after their stay.

Social Sharing

According to research, 92% of consumers say they trust earned media, such as word-of-mouth and reccomendations from friends and family, above all other forms of advertising. CityKey allows your guests to share their experiences on social media with your hotel’s branding at the core of their post.

Personalized Content

Every hotel is different, and so is every guest. CityKey allows you to publish experiences, activities, and events that are customized for your guests to make sure they are hyper-relevant.

Step 3: Learn their Preferences

As guests use your site you gain real insights into their preferences and interests that allow you to better understand what makes a truly great trip.

  • 1

    View Analytics

    Easily identify trends and usage metrics to see what activities and services are trending with your guests.

  • 2

    Optimize Your Guide

    View and adjust your site’s categories and activities. You can also browse the CityKey content cloud or even create your own unique content for your guide with ease.

  • 3

    Get in the Know

    We update the CityKey content cloud with new events and activities to help you know what’s going on in your city. Your hotel’s dashboard can help staff stay informed.

  • 4

    Selective Access

    Allow unique access to managers, concierge, corporate marketing, or other staff who you want to be able to edit your page.

  • 5

    Reservation Requests

    See new requests for bookings sent from guests through your micro-site and let your concierge and front desk make them when they aren’t busy at the desk.

Step 4: Tailor the Experience

Knowledge is power.

CityKey is a powerful customer discovery tool that enables you to not only learn about your guests’ preferences outside of your hotel, but it also allows you to make changes to the types of experiences you reccomend as you learn what is most meaningful and interesting to them from the analytics. This allows you to constantly improve the guest experience outside your hotel, the same way you constantly improve the experience inside your hotel.

Step 5: Watch Them Enjoy

  • 35%

    of users click through to the guide in hotel confirmation and pre-arrival emails.
    Guests are interested in travel planning advice from hotels.

  • 45%

    of users access guides on their mobile device.
    Guests use hotel CityKey guides on the go to find great experiences during their stay.

  • 2x

    more unique visitors to guides than unique emails acquired by partner hotels.
    Guests are using the guides and sharing them with their friends and fellow travelers too bringing in more traffic.

Ready to start guiding your
guests to better experiences?
